Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small CancellationGroupoid Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small CancellationGroupoid AllSmallCancellationGroupoid is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic cancellationgroupoid models from orders 2 to 5.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of CancellationGroupoid formulas(CancellationGroupoid).
(y*x = z*x | x*y = x*z) -> y = z.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
